articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: UK’s Sunak promises mandatory national service for 18-year-olds if elected - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Ruling Conservative Party says it will bring back national service if it wins the July 4 general election.
articles.content: Eighteen-year-olds will have to perform a mandatory national service if the Conservative Party is voted back to power in the United Kingdoms July 4 election, Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has announced.… [+2861 chars]

articles.title: Would you use Copilot AI in your Xbox games? - TrueAchievements
articles.description: This week, Microsoft announced that Copilot AI tech is coming to PC and Xbox games. For this week's poll, we want to know: would you use Copilot AI in your Xbox games?
